## Notes and Intervals
The Harmonic scale in C# (Romanian mode, Shape C) consists of the following notes: C#, D, E, F#, G, A, B#, C#. The intervals for this scale are as follows: 
- Whole Step - Half Step - Whole Step - Whole Step - Half Step - Augmented Second - Half Step
